From Tealeaves Require Export
  Examples.SystemF.Syntax
  Examples.SystemF.Contexts
  Simplification.Tests.SystemF_LN.

From Coq Require Import
  Sorting.Permutation.

Implicit Types (x : atom).
Open Scope set_scope.

(** * Properties of the typing judgment <<Î” ; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„>> *)
(******************************************************************************)

(** ** Structural properties <<Î” ; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„>> in <<Î”>> *)
(******************************************************************************)

(** *** <<Î”>> is always well-formed *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> ok_kind_ctx Î”


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> ok_kind_ctx Î”

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
uniq Î”
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ e0 ~ Ï„1
âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2
H0: uniq Î”
e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
uniq Î”
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t1 : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
H0: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
IHJudgment1, IHJudgment2: uniq Î”
uniq Î”
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
e0: atom
H: Î” ++ e0 ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) Ï„
e: atom
H0: uniq (Î” ++ e ~ tt)
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
uniq Î”
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
H0: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHJudgment: uniq Î”
uniq Î”

  all: (autorewrite with tea_rw_uniq in *; intuition).
Qed.

(** *** Permutation *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î”1 Î”2 : list (atom * unit)) (Î“ : type_ctx)
  (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
Permutation Î”1 Î”2 -> Î”1; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„


forall (Î”1 Î”2 : list (atom * unit)) (Î“ : type_ctx)
  (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
Permutation Î”1 Î”2 -> Î”1; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  
Î”1, Î”2: list (atom * unit)

Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„

Î”2: list (atom * unit)

Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ tm_app t1 t2 : Ï„2

forall (Î”1 Î”2 : list (atom * unit)) x (Î“ : type_ctx)
  (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
(Î”1 ++ x ~ tt) ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ ->
(Î”1 ++ Î”2) ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  all: auto using Permutation_refl, Permutation_app_comm.
Qed.

(** *** Weakening *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î”1 : alist unit) (Î”2 : kind_ctx)
  (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
ok_kind_ctx Î”2 ->
disjoint Î”1 Î”2 -> Î”1; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> Î”1 ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„


forall (Î”1 : alist unit) (Î”2 : kind_ctx)
  (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
ok_kind_ctx Î”2 ->
disjoint Î”1 Î”2 -> Î”1; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> Î”1 ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„

Î”2: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

Ï„: typ LN

Î”1 ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„

e: AtomSet.elt
IH: disjoint (Î” ++ e ~ tt) Î”2 ->
(Î” ++ e ~ tt) ++ Î”2; Î“
âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„
Notin: e `notin` (L âˆª domset Î”2)
(Î” ++ e ~ tt) ++ Î”2; Î“
âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„

    
Î”2: kind_ctx
ok: ok_kind_ctx Î”2
Î”: kind_ctx
disj: disjoint Î” Î”2
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
e: AtomSet.elt
IH: disjoint Î” Î”2 /\ e `notin` domset Î”2 ->
(Î” ++ e ~ tt) ++ Î”2; Î“
âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„
Notin: e `notin` (L âˆª domset Î”2)
(Î” ++ e ~ tt) ++ Î”2; Î“
âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„

    intuition fsetdec.
  
Î”2: kind_ctx
ok: ok_kind_ctx Î”2
Î”: kind_ctx
disj: disjoint Î” Î”2
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: disjoint Î” Î”2 -> Î” ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
Î” ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ tm_tap t Ï„1 : open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2
 apply j_inst; auto with sysf_ctx.
Qed.

(** *** Substitution *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î”1 : list (atom * unit)) x
  (Î”2 : list (atom * unit)) (Î“ : type_ctx)
  (t : term LN) (Ï„ Ï„' : typ LN),
ok_type (Î”1 ++ Î”2) Ï„' ->
Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ ->
Î”1 ++ Î”2; envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') Î“
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„' t : subst typ ktyp x Ï„' Ï„


forall (Î”1 : list (atom * unit)) x
  (Î”2 : list (atom * unit)) (Î“ : type_ctx)
  (t : term LN) (Ï„ Ï„' : typ LN),
ok_type (Î”1 ++ Î”2) Ï„' ->
Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ ->
Î”1 ++ Î”2; envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') Î“
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„' t : subst typ ktyp x Ï„' Ï„

  
Î”1: list (atom * unit)
x: atom
Î”2: list (atom * unit)
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„, Ï„': typ LN
Hok: ok_type (Î”1 ++ Î”2) Ï„'
j: Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
Î”1 ++ Î”2; envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') Î“
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„' t : subst typ ktyp x Ï„' Ï„
 
Î”1: list (atom * unit)
x: atom

Î”1 ++ Î”2; envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') Î“
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„' t : subst typ ktyp x Ï„' Ï„

Î“: type_ctx

ok_type (Î”1 ++ Î”2) Ï„' ->

Î”1 ++ Î”2; envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') Î“
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„' t :

Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2 = Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”3 ->
Î”1 ++ Î”3;

âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„'
    (open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x0)) t)
: subst typ ktyp x Ï„' Ï„2

Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2; Î“ ++ x0 ~ Ï„1

Î”2: list (atom * unit)
e: AtomSet.elt
IH: forall Î”3 : list (atom * unit),
ok_type (Î”1 ++ Î”3) Ï„' ->
Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2 = Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”3 ->
Î”1 ++ Î”3;
envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') (Î“ ++ e ~ Ï„1)
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„'
    (open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e)) t)
: subst typ ktyp x Ï„' Ï„2

âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x0)) t : Ï„2

Î”1 ++ Î”2;

Î”1: list (atom * unit)

Ï„': typ LN
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
Î”2: list (atom * unit)
H0: forall x0 : AtomSet.elt,
x0 `notin` L ->
forall Î”3 : list (atom * unit),
ok_type (Î”1 ++ Î”3) Ï„' ->
(Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2) ++ x0 ~ tt =
Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”3 ->
Î”1 ++ Î”3; envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') Î“
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„'
    (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x0)) t)

    (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x0)) Ï„)
H: forall x0 : AtomSet.elt,
x0 `notin` L ->
(Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2) ++ x0 ~ tt; Î“
âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x0)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x0)) Ï„
Hok: ok_type (Î”1 ++ Î”2) Ï„'
Î”1 ++ Î”2; envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') Î“
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„' (tm_tab t)
: subst typ ktyp x Ï„' (ty_univ Ï„)
 
Î”1: list (atom * unit)
x: atom
Ï„': typ LN
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
Î”2: list (atom * unit)
IH: forall x0 : AtomSet.elt,
x0 `notin` L ->
forall Î”3 : list (atom * unit),
ok_type (Î”1 ++ Î”3) Ï„' ->
(Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”2) ++ x0 ~ tt =
Î”1 ++ x ~ tt ++ Î”3 ->
Î”1 ++ Î”3; envmap (subst typ ktyp x Ï„') Î“
âŠ¢ subst term ktyp x Ï„'
    (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x0)) t)

    (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x0)) Ï„)

      auto using ok_type_weak_r.

H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,

Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
e: atom
IH: ok_type_ctx (Î” ++ e ~ tt) Î“
Hfresh: e
`notin` (L
         âˆª atoms
             (bind
                (fun '(_, t) =>
                 free typ ktyp t) Î“))
t0: typ LN
Hin: t0 âˆˆ range Î“
~ e âˆˆ bind (fun '(_, t) => free typ ktyp t) Î“

      
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
e: atom
IH: ok_type_ctx (Î” ++ e ~ tt) Î“
Hfresh: e
`notin` (L
         âˆª atoms
             (bind
                (fun '(_, t) =>
                 free typ ktyp t) Î“))
t0: typ LN
Hin: t0 âˆˆ range Î“
lemma: ~ e âˆˆ bind (fun '(_, t) => free typ ktyp t) Î“
e `notin` FV typ ktyp t0
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
e: atom

`notin` (L
         âˆª atoms

                (fun '(_, t) =>
                 free typ ktyp t) Î“))
t0: typ LN

lemma: ~
(exists a : atom * typ LN,
   a âˆˆ Î“ /\
   e âˆˆ (let '(_, t) := a in free typ ktyp t))
e `notin` FV typ ktyp t0

        
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

   e âˆˆ (let '(_, t) := a in free typ ktyp t))
e `notin` FV typ ktyp t0

        now apply free_iff_FV. 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,

~ e âˆˆ bind (fun '(_, t) => free typ ktyp t) Î“

      
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,

Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„

t: term LN

t0: typ LN
Hin: t0 âˆˆ range Î“
e
`notin` atoms
          (bind (fun '(_, t) => free typ ktyp t) Î“)
 fsetdec. }
Qed.

(** *** Tactical corollaries *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN) x (Ï„2 : typ LN),
Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ ->
(x, Ï„2) âˆˆ (Î“ : list (atom * typ LN)) -> ok_type Î” Ï„2


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN) x (Ï„2 : typ LN),
Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ ->
(x, Ï„2) âˆˆ (Î“ : list (atom * typ LN)) -> ok_type Î” Ï„2

  eauto using ok_type_ctx_binds, j_type_ctx_wf.
Qed.


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : list (atom * typ LN))
  (t : term LN) (Ï„1 Ï„2 : typ LN) x,
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1 -> ok_type Î” Ï„2


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : list (atom * typ LN))
  (t : term LN) (Ï„1 Ï„2 : typ LN) x,
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1 -> ok_type Î” Ï„2

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: list (atom * typ LN)
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
x: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
ok_type Î” Ï„2
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: list (atom * typ LN)
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
x: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
Î”; ?Î“ âŠ¢ ?t : ?Ï„
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: list (atom * typ LN)
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
x: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
(?x, Ï„2) âˆˆ ?Î“
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: list (atom * typ LN)
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
x: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
(?x, Ï„2) âˆˆ (Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: list (atom * typ LN)
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
x: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
(?x, Ï„2) âˆˆ Î“ \/ (?x, Ï„2) = (x, Ï„2)
 eauto.
Qed.

(** *** Permutation *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 : type_ctx)
  (Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN)) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN),
Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> Permutation Î“1 Î“2 -> Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 : type_ctx)
  (Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN)) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN),
Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> Permutation Î“1 Î“2 -> Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1: type_ctx
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„
perm: Permutation Î“1 Î“2
Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„
forall Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN),
Permutation Î“1 Î“2 -> Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
Hperm: Permutation Î“ Î“2
Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ tm_var (Fr x) : Ï„
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
forall Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN),

Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t : Ï„2
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
Hperm: Permutation Î“ Î“2
Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ tm_abs Ï„1 t : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
Hperm: Permutation Î“ Î“2
Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ tm_var (Fr x) : Ï„
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
Hperm: Permutation Î“ Î“2
ok_kind_ctx Î”
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
Hperm: Permutation Î“ Î“2
ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
Hperm: Permutation Î“ Î“2
(x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“2

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN

H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
Hperm: Permutation Î“ Î“2
ok_kind_ctx Î”
 eauto using ok_kind_ctx_perm.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
Hperm: Permutation Î“ Î“2
ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
 rewrite ok_type_ctx_perm_gamma;
        eauto using Permutation_sym.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”

H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)

(x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“2
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN

H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)

(x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“2

      erewrite List.permutation_spec; eauto.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2

Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t : Ï„2
Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)

Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ tm_abs Ï„1 t : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
 econstructor; eauto using Permutation_app_tail.
Qed.


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN))
  (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
Permutation Î“1 Î“2 -> Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„ <-> Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN))
  (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
Permutation Î“1 Î“2 -> Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„ <-> Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1, Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN

Î”: kind_ctx

t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN

H: Permutation Î“2 Î“1
Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„ <-> Î”; Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  split; eauto using j_type_ctx_perm.
Qed.


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN)) 
  x (Ï„2 : typ LN) (t : term LN) (Ï„1 : typ LN),
Î”; (Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2) ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1 <->
Î”; (Î“1 ++ Î“2) ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN)) 
  x (Ï„2 : typ LN) (t : term LN) (Ï„1 : typ LN),
Î”; (Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2) ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1 <->
Î”; (Î“1 ++ Î“2) ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1, Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
x: atom
Ï„2: typ LN
t: term LN
Ï„1: typ LN
Î”; (Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2) ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1 <->
Î”; (Î“1 ++ Î“2) ++ x ~ Ï„2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1, Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
x: atom
Ï„2: typ LN
t: term LN
Ï„1: typ LN
Permutation ((Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2) ++ Î“2)
  ((Î“1 ++ Î“2) ++ x ~ Ï„2)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1, Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
x: atom
Ï„2: typ LN
t: term LN
Ï„1: typ LN
Permutation (Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2 ++ Î“2) (Î“1 ++ Î“2 ++ x ~ Ï„2)
 apply Permutation_app; auto using Permutation_app_comm.
Qed.

(** *** Weakening *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 : alist (typ LN))
  (Î“2 : type_ctx) (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2 ->
disjoint Î“1 Î“2 -> Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 : alist (typ LN))
  (Î“2 : type_ctx) (t : term LN) (Ï„ : typ LN),
ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2 ->
disjoint Î“1 Î“2 -> Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1: alist (typ LN)
Î“2: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
ok: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
disj: disjoint Î“1 Î“2
j: Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  (* save knowledge that Î” is uniq for [j_inst] case *)
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1: alist (typ LN)
Î“2: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
ok: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
disj: disjoint Î“1 Î“2
j: Î”; Î“1 âŠ¢ t : Ï„
okÎ”: ok_kind_ctx Î”
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„

  
Î“2: type_ctx
Î”: kind_ctx
ok: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
Î“: type_ctx
disj: disjoint Î“ Î“2
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
okÎ”: ok_kind_ctx Î”
Î”; Î“ ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ tm_var (Fr x) : Ï„
Î“2: type_ctx
Î”: kind_ctx
ok: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
Î“: type_ctx
disj: disjoint Î“ Î“2
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2 ->
disjoint (Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1) Î“2 ->
ok_kind_ctx Î” ->
Î”; (Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1) ++ Î“2
âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t : Ï„2
okÎ”: ok_kind_ctx Î”
Î”; Î“ ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ tm_abs Ï„1 t : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
Î“2: type_ctx
Î”: kind_ctx
ok: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
Î“: type_ctx
disj: disjoint Î“ Î“2
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
j1: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t1 : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
j2: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
okÎ”: ok_kind_ctx Î”
IHj1: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2 ->
disjoint Î“ Î“2 ->
ok_kind_ctx Î” -> Î”; Î“ ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t1 : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
IHj2: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2 ->
disjoint Î“ Î“2 ->
ok_kind_ctx Î” -> Î”; Î“ ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
Î”; Î“ ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ tm_app t1 t2 : Ï„2
Î“2: type_ctx
Î”: kind_ctx
ok: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
Î“: type_ctx
disj: disjoint Î“ Î“2
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
ok_type_ctx (Î” ++ x ~ tt) Î“2 ->
disjoint Î“ Î“2 ->
ok_kind_ctx (Î” ++ x ~ tt) ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ ++ Î“2
âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
okÎ”: ok_kind_ctx Î”
Î”; Î“ ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ tm_tab t : ty_univ Ï„
Î“2: type_ctx
Î”: kind_ctx
ok: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
Î“: type_ctx
disj: disjoint Î“ Î“2
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1

Î“2: type_ctx
Î”: kind_ctx
ok: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“2
Î“: type_ctx
disj: disjoint Î“ Î“2
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1

disjoint Î“ Î“2 ->
ok_kind_ctx Î” -> Î”; Î“ ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
Î”; Î“ ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
 apply IHj; auto.
Qed.

(** *** Substitution *)
(******************************************************************************)

(** ** Properties in Ï„ of <<(Î” ; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„>> *)
(******************************************************************************)

(** *** <<Ï„>> is always locally closed *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> LC typ ktyp Ï„


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> LC typ ktyp Ï„

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
LC typ ktyp Ï„
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
LC typ ktyp Ï„
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L -> LC typ ktyp Ï„2
LC typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
j1: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t1 : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
j2: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
IHj1: LC typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)
IHj2: LC typ ktyp Ï„1
LC typ ktyp Ï„2
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„)
LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
LC typ ktyp Ï„
 eapply ok_type_ctx_binds; eauto.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L -> LC typ ktyp Ï„2
LC typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ e0 ~ Ï„1
âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2
H0: LC typ ktyp Ï„2
e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ e0 ~ Ï„1
âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2
H0: LC typ ktyp Ï„2
e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC typ ktyp Ï„1 /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„2

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ e0 ~ Ï„1
âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2
H0: LC typ ktyp Ï„2
e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC typ ktyp Ï„1
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ e0 ~ Ï„1
âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2
H0: LC typ ktyp Ï„2
e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC typ ktyp Ï„2

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ e0 ~ Ï„1
âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2

e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC typ ktyp Ï„1
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
H0: LC typ ktyp Ï„2
e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC typ ktyp Ï„1

      eapply ok_type_lc; eauto.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom
H: Î”; Î“ ++ e0 ~ Ï„1
âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2
H0: LC typ ktyp Ï„2
e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC typ ktyp Ï„2
 auto.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
j1: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t1 : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
j2: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
IHj1: LC typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)
IHj2: LC typ ktyp Ï„1
LC typ ktyp Ï„2
 now replace (LC (ix := I2) typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2))
      with (LC typ ktyp Ï„1 /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„2) in IHj1 by (now simplify_LC).
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„)
LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
e0: atom
H: Î” ++ e0 ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) Ï„
e: atom
H0: LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„)
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„)

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
e0: atom
H: Î” ++ e0 ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) Ï„
e: atom
H0: LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„)
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„

    rewrite (open_lc_gap_eq_var typ); eauto.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LC (SystemF ktyp) ktyp Ï„1

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2

      assumption.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LC (SystemF ktyp) ktyp Ï„1
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
ok_type ?Î” Ï„1
 eassumption.
Qed.

(** *** <<Ï„>> is always well-formed *)
(******************************************************************************)


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Ï„1 Ï„2 : typ LN),
ok_type Î” (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2) =
(ok_type Î” Ï„1 /\ ok_type Î” Ï„2)


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Ï„1 Ï„2 : typ LN),
ok_type Î” (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2) =
(ok_type Î” Ï„1 /\ ok_type Î” Ï„2)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
ok_type Î” (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2) =
(ok_type Î” Ï„1 /\ ok_type Î” Ï„2)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
(FV typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î” /\
 LC typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)) =
((FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1) /\
 FV typ ktyp Ï„2 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„2)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
((FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1) /\
 FV typ ktyp Ï„2 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„2) =
(FV typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î” /\
 LC typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2))

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
((FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1) /\
 FV typ ktyp Ï„2 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„2) =
(atoms (free typ ktyp Ï„1 ++ free typ ktyp Ï„2)
 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2))

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
((FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1) /\
 FV typ ktyp Ï„2 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„2) =
(atoms (free typ ktyp Ï„1 ++ free typ ktyp Ï„2)
 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1 /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„2)

  propext;
    rewrite atoms_app;
    intuition fsetdec.
Qed.


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Ï„ : typ LN),
ok_type Î” (ty_univ Ï„) =
(scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) (domset Î”) /\
 LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„)


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Ï„ : typ LN),
ok_type Î” (ty_univ Ï„) =
(scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) (domset Î”) /\
 LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„: typ LN
ok_type Î” (ty_univ Ï„) =
(scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) (domset Î”) /\
 LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„: typ LN
(FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) âŠ† domset Î” /\
 LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„)) =
(FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) âŠ† domset Î” /\
 LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„: typ LN
(FV typ ktyp Ï„ âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„)) =
(FV typ ktyp Ï„ âŠ† domset Î” /\ LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Ï„: typ LN
(FV typ ktyp Ï„ âŠ† domset Î” /\ LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„) =
(FV typ ktyp Ï„ âŠ† domset Î” /\ LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„)

  reflexivity.
Qed.


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> ok_type Î” Ï„


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> ok_type Î” Ï„

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
ok_type Î” Ï„
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
ok_type Î” Ï„
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L -> ok_type Î” Ï„2
ok_type Î” (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
j1: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t1 : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
j2: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
IHj1: ok_type Î” (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)
IHj2: ok_type Î” Ï„1
ok_type Î” Ï„2
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
ok_type (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
  (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„)
ok_type Î” (ty_univ Ï„)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: ok_type Î” (ty_univ Ï„2)
ok_type Î” (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
ok_type Î” Ï„
 eauto using ok_type_ctx_binds.
  
Î”: kind_ctx

 eapply j_type_ctx2; eauto.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2

Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})

Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

IHj1: ok_type Î” (ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2)
IHj2: ok_type Î” Ï„1
ok_type Î” Ï„2
 now rewrite ok_type_rw_ty_ar in IHj1.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
ok_type (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
  (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„)
ok_type Î” (ty_univ Ï„)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
ok_type (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
  (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„)
scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) (domset Î”) /\
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
IH: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
ok_type (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
  (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„)
scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) (domset Î”) /\
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
IH: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
ok_type (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
  (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„)
e: atom
Hfresh: e `notin` (L âˆª FV typ ktyp Ï„)
scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) (domset Î”) /\
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
e: atom
IH: ok_type (Î” ++ e ~ tt)
  (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„)
Hfresh: e `notin` (L âˆª FV typ ktyp Ï„)
scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) (domset Î”) /\
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
e: atom
IHsc: scoped typ ktyp (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„)
  (domset (Î” ++ e ~ tt))
IHlc: LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) Ï„)
Hfresh: e `notin` (L âˆª FV typ ktyp Ï„)
scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„) (domset Î”) /\
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„

        fsetdec.

      rewrite FV_open_lower; eauto; typeclasses eauto.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t

LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„

Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t

  (domset (Î” ++ e ~ tt))

Hfresh: e `notin` (L âˆª FV typ ktyp Ï„)
LC (SystemF ktyp) ktyp (ty_v (Fr e))

      now simplify_LC.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: ok_type Î” (ty_univ Ï„2)
ok_type Î” (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: scoped typ ktyp Ï„1 (domset Î”) /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: scoped typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) (domset Î”) /\
LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
scoped typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2) (domset Î”) /\
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

IHj: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î” /\

FV typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î” /\
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)

FV typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î” /\
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)

        fsetdec.
      
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

Î“: type_ctx

FV typ ktyp Ï„2 = FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)

        
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

IHj_LC: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
FV typ ktyp Ï„2 = FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
 now simplify_FV.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

IHj_LC: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
LC typ ktyp (open typ ktyp Ï„1 Ï„2)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1

IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2 = LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)

      
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1

IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
LC (SystemF ktyp) ktyp Ï„1
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2 = LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)

      
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
 assumption. 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
LC (SystemF ktyp) ktyp Ï„1
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2 = LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)

      
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2
LC (SystemF ktyp) ktyp Ï„1
 tauto. 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2 = LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)

      
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î” /\ LC typ ktyp Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj_FV: FV typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2) âŠ† domset Î”
IHj_LC: LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
LCn typ ktyp 1 Ï„2 = LC typ ktyp (ty_univ Ï„2)
 now simplify_LC. }
Qed.

(** ** Properties in t of <<(Î” ; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„>> *)
(******************************************************************************)

(** *** <<t>> is always locally closed w.r.t. term variables *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> LC term ktrm t


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> LC term ktrm t

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
LC term ktrm t
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
IH: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
LC term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x))
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
IH: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC term ktrm (open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t)
LC term ktrm (tm_abs Ï„1 t)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
j1: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t1 : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
j2: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
IHj1: LC term ktrm t1
IHj2: LC term ktrm t2
LC term ktrm (tm_app t1 t2)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
IH: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC term ktrm (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t)
LC term ktrm (tm_tab t)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktrm t
LC term ktrm (tm_tap t Ï„1)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
IH: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
LC term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x))
 now simplify_LC.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
IH: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC term ktrm (open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t)
LC term ktrm (tm_abs Ï„1 t)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
e0: atom

âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e0)) t : Ï„2
e: atom
IH: LC term ktrm (open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr e)) t)
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC term ktrm (tm_abs Ï„1 t)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t

Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

LC typ ktrm Ï„1 /\ LCn term ktrm 1 t

Î”: kind_ctx

 now simplify_LC.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN

 now simplify_LC.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

     t)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

     t)
 exact IH.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
e0: atom
H: Î” ++ e0 ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) Ï„
e: atom
IH: LC term ktrm (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) t)
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
ktrm <> ktyp
 discriminate.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktrm t
LC term ktrm (tm_tap t Ï„1)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktrm t
LC term ktrm t /\ LC typ ktrm Ï„1
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktrm t
LC term ktrm t
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktrm t
LC typ ktrm Ï„1

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktrm t
LC term ktrm t
 assumption.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktrm t
LC typ ktrm Ï„1
 apply LC_typ_trm.
Qed.

(** *** <<t>> is always locally closed w.r.t. type variables *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> LC term ktyp t


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> LC term ktyp t

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
LC term ktyp t
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
H0: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
LC term ktyp (tm_var (Fr x))
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC term ktyp (open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t)
LC term ktyp (tm_abs Ï„1 t)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
j1: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t1 : ty_ar Ï„1 Ï„2
j2: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
IHj1: LC term ktyp t1
IHj2: LC term ktyp t2
LC term ktyp (tm_app t1 t2)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC term ktyp (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t)
LC term ktyp (tm_tab t)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktyp t
LC term ktyp (tm_tap t Ï„1)

 now simplify_LC.

Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

j2: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t2 : Ï„1
IHj1: LC term ktyp t1
IHj2: LC term ktyp t2
LC term ktyp (tm_app t1 t2)
 now simplify_LC.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
H0: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC term ktyp (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t)
LC term ktyp (tm_tab t)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
IH: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
LC term ktyp (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t)
LC term ktyp (tm_tab t)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN

H: Î” ++ e0 ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) Ï„
e: atom
IH: LC term ktyp (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) t)
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
LC term ktyp (tm_tab t)

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN

e: atom
IH: LC term ktyp (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) t)

LCn term ktyp 1 t

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN

  (open term ktyp (mret SystemF ktyp (Fr ?Goal1)) t)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

Ï„: typ LN

1 > 0

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN

  (open term ktyp (mret SystemF ktyp (Fr ?Goal1)) t)
 exact IH.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
e0: atom
H: Î” ++ e0 ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr e0)) Ï„
e: atom
IH: LC term ktyp (open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr e)) t)
Hfresh: e `notin` L
Hfresh0: e0 `notin` (L âˆª {{e}})
1 > 0
 lia.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktyp t
LC term ktyp (tm_tap t Ï„1)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktyp t
LC term ktyp t
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktyp t
LC typ ktyp Ï„1

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktyp t
LC term ktyp t
 assumption.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: LC term ktyp t
LC typ ktyp Ï„1
 now inversion H.
Qed.

(** *** <<t>> is always well-scoped w.r.t. type variables *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN),
Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> scoped term ktyp t (domset Î”)


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN),
Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> scoped term ktyp t (domset Î”)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
scoped term ktyp t (domset Î”)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
IH: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
scoped term ktyp (tm_var (Fr x)) (domset Î”)
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„1 âŠ¢ open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t
: Ï„2
IH: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
scoped term ktyp
  (open term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) t) (domset Î”)
scoped term ktyp (tm_abs Ï„1 t) (domset Î”)

Î“: type_ctx
t1, t2: term LN

scoped term ktyp (tm_tap t Ï„1) (domset Î”)

    fsetdec.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t

t: term LN

Î”: kind_ctx

Î”: kind_ctx

Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
x: atom
IH: FV term ktyp t âŠ† domset (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
Hfresh: x `notin` (L âˆª FV term ktyp t)
scoped term ktyp t (domset (Î” ++ ?x ~ ?x'))
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
x: atom
IH: FV term ktyp t âŠ† domset (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
Hfresh: x `notin` (L âˆª FV term ktyp t)
?x `notin` FV term ktyp t

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
x: atom
IH: FV term ktyp t âŠ† domset (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
Hfresh: x `notin` (L âˆª FV term ktyp t)
scoped term ktyp t (domset (Î” ++ ?x ~ ?x'))
 eauto.
    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
L: AtomSet.t
Ï„: typ LN
t: term LN
H: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
Î” ++ x ~ tt; Î“ âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t
: open typ ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) Ï„
x: atom
IH: FV term ktyp t âŠ† domset (Î” ++ x ~ tt)
Hfresh: x `notin` (L âˆª FV term ktyp t)
x `notin` FV term ktyp t
 fsetdec.
  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: scoped term ktyp t (domset Î”)
scoped term ktyp (tm_tap t Ï„1) (domset Î”)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: FV term ktyp t âŠ† domset Î”
FV term ktyp (tm_tap t Ï„1) âŠ† domset Î”

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: FV term ktyp t âŠ† domset Î”
FV term ktyp t âˆª FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î”

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: FV term ktyp t âŠ† domset Î”
H0: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î”
FV term ktyp t âˆª FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î”

    fsetdec.
Qed.

(** *** <<t>> is always well-scoped w.r.t. term variables *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN),
Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> scoped term ktrm t (domset Î“)


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN),
Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> scoped term ktrm t (domset Î“)

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
scoped term ktrm t (domset Î“)
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
x: atom
Ï„: typ LN
H: ok_kind_ctx Î”
IH: ok_type_ctx Î” Î“
H1: (x, Ï„) âˆˆ Î“
FV term ktrm (tm_var (Fr x)) âŠ† domset Î“

Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx

Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: FV term ktrm t âŠ† domset Î“
H0: scoped typ ktyp Ï„1 (domset Î”)
H1: LC typ ktyp Ï„1
FV typ ktrm Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î“

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN

H1: LC typ ktyp Ï„1
FV typ ktrm Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î“

    
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
H: ok_type Î” Ï„1
j: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
IHj: FV term ktrm t âŠ† domset Î“
H0: FV typ ktyp Ï„1 âŠ† domset Î”
H1: LC typ ktyp Ï„1
âˆ… âŠ† domset Î“

    fsetdec.
Qed.

(** *** <<t>> is always well-formed *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> ok_term Î” Î“ t


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : type_ctx) (t : term LN)
  (Ï„ : typ LN), Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„ -> ok_term Î” Î“ t

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
H: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
ok_term Î” Î“ t
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: type_ctx
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
H: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„
scoped term ktyp t (domset Î”) /\
scoped term ktrm t (domset Î“) /\
LC term ktrm t /\ LC term ktyp t

  intuition (eauto using j_sc_KTerm_term, j_sc_ktyp_term, j_lc_KTerm_term, j_lc_ktyp_term).
Qed.

(** *** Substitution *)
(******************************************************************************)

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN)) 
  x (Ï„2 : typ LN) (t u : term LN) (Ï„1 : typ LN),
Î”; Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1 ->
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ u : Ï„2 ->
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ subst term ktrm x u t : Ï„1


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“1 Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN)) 
  x (Ï„2 : typ LN) (t u : term LN) (Ï„1 : typ LN),
Î”; Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1 ->
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ u : Ï„2 ->
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ subst term ktrm x u t : Ï„1

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1, Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
x: atom
Ï„2: typ LN
t, u: term LN
Ï„1: typ LN
jt: Î”; Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
ju: Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ u : Ï„2
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ subst term ktrm x u t : Ï„1
 
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1, Î“2: list (atom * typ LN)
x: atom
Ï„2: typ LN
t, u: term LN
Ï„1: typ LN
Î“: list (atom * typ LN)
HeqÎ“: Î“ = Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2 ++ Î“2
jt: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
ju: Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ u : Ï„2
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ subst term ktrm x u t : Ï„1

  
Î”: kind_ctx
Î“1: list (atom * typ LN)
x: atom
Ï„2: typ LN
t, u: term LN
Ï„1: typ LN
Î“: list (atom * typ LN)
jt: Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
forall Î“2 : list (atom * typ LN),
Î“ = Î“1 ++ x ~ Ï„2 ++ Î“2 ->
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ u : Ï„2 ->
Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ subst term ktrm x u t : Ï„1
 
Î“1: list (atom * typ LN)
x: atom

ju: Î”; Î“1 ++ Î“2 âŠ¢ u : Ï„2

Î“1: list (atom * typ LN)

Ï„2: typ LN

Î”: kind_ctx

forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : list (atom * typ LN)) x

Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ u : Ï„2 -> Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ subst term ktrm x u t : Ï„1


forall (Î” : kind_ctx) (Î“ : list (atom * typ LN)) x

Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ u : Ï„2 -> Î”; Î“ âŠ¢ subst term ktrm x u t : Ï„1

Î”: kind_ctx
Î“: list (atom * typ LN)
x: atom
Ï„2: typ LN
t, u: term LN
Ï„1: typ LN
jt: Î”; Î“ ++ x ~ Ï„2 ++ [] âŠ¢ t : Ï„1
ju: Î”; Î“ ++ [] âŠ¢ u : Ï„2
Î”; Î“ ++ [] âŠ¢ subst term ktrm x u t : Ï„1

  eauto using j_type_ctx_subst.
Qed.

(** * Progress and preservation *)
(******************************************************************************)

preservation


preservation

  
t, t': term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: []; [] âŠ¢ t : Ï„
red t t' -> []; [] âŠ¢ t' : Ï„
 
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
j: []; [] âŠ¢ t : Ï„
forall t' : term LN, red t t' -> []; [] âŠ¢ t' : Ï„

  
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
Delta: list (atom * unit)
HeqDelta: Delta = []
j: Delta; [] âŠ¢ t : Ï„
forall t' : term LN, red t t' -> Delta; [] âŠ¢ t' : Ï„

  
t: term LN
Ï„: typ LN
Delta: list (atom * unit)
HeqDelta: Delta = []
Gamma: list (atom * typ LN)
HeqGamma: Gamma = []
j: Delta; Gamma âŠ¢ t : Ï„
forall t' : term LN, red t t' -> Delta; Gamma âŠ¢ t' : Ï„

H0: red (tm_tap (tm_tab t0) Ï„1)
  (open term ktyp Ï„1 t0)
L: AtomSet.t
H5: forall x : AtomSet.elt,
x `notin` L ->
[] ++ x ~ tt; []
âŠ¢ open term ktyp (ty_v (Fr x)) t0

e: atom
Hfresh: e
`notin` (L
         âˆª (FV term ktyp t0 âˆª FV typ ktyp Ï„2))
[] ++ e ~ tt; []
âŠ¢ open term ktyp (mret SystemF ktyp (Fr e)) t0

t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
j: []; [] âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
H: ok_type [] Ï„1
H0: exists t' : term LN, red t t'
exists t' : term LN, red (tm_tap t Ï„1) t'
 
t: term LN
Ï„1, Ï„2: typ LN
j: []; [] âŠ¢ t : ty_univ Ï„2
H: ok_type [] Ï„1
x: term LN
H1: red t x
exists t' : term LN, red (tm_tap t Ï„1) t'

      eauto using red.
Qed.


Axioms:
base_typ : Type

(* Axioms:
base_typ : Type
*)

Axioms:
propositional_extensionality
  : forall P Q : Prop, P <-> Q -> P = Q
functional_extensionality_dep
  : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> Type)
      (f g : forall x : A, B x),
    (forall x : A, f x = g x) -> f = g
Eqdep.Eq_rect_eq.eq_rect_eq
  : forall (U : Type) (p : U) (Q : U -> Type)
      (x : Q p) (h : p = p), x = rew [Q] h in x
base_typ : Type

(*
Axioms:
propositional_extensionality : forall P Q : Prop, P <-> Q -> P = Q
functional_extensionality_dep
  : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> Type) (f g : forall x : A, B x),
    (forall x : A, f x = g x) -> f = g
Eqdep.Eq_rect_eq.eq_rect_eq
  : forall (U : Type) (p : U) (Q : U -> Type) (x : Q p) (h : p = p),
    x = rew [Q] h in x
base_typ : Type
*)
